administration with virtualization platforms utilizing VMware across several different industries Over the past two years my plan for accomplishment included maintaining a stable network infrastructure as an independent contractor utilizing my adaptability fundamental analytical and critical thinking skills to implement solutions to both hardware and software configurations for complex systems I am well versed in Project Management and possess sound leadership driving team members towards successful deliverables with projects from inception to completion Over my career I
